In England, in the seven days to 07 November, there were 191,950 new confirmed cases (339.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 October, there were 233,252 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 18% (41,302 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 November is 8,051,924 (14,238.6 cases per 100,000 population).
